name: Luka
body:
### Luka is a simple proxy that gives you a fluent interface layer on top of any object.

```ruby
class Pie
  def slice
    @sliced = true
  end

  def take
    @taken = true
  end

  def sliced?
    @sliced
  end

  def taken?
    @taken
  end
end

include Luka

pie = Pie.new
eloquent_pie = luka(Pie.new)
eloquent_pie.slice.take
    
eloquent_pie.sliced? # => true
eloquent_pie.taken? # => true
```

There you have it.
